import React from "react"; import "./TypeDay.css"; import { Col, Row, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BsFillSuitHeartFill } from "react-icons/bs"; import { GiEasterEgg } from "react-icons/gi"; import { TbChristmasTree } from "react-icons/tb"; const TypeDay = ({ colorWines, typeWines, grapeWines }) => { return (
• Type Day

- Wine would you pair on :

Type {typeWines.map((type) => ( ))} Color {colorWines.map((color) => ( ))} Grape {grapeWines.map((grape) => ( ))} Year Range

3. Easter Day  {" "} {" "}

3. Valentine Day  {" "} {" "}

); }; export default TypeDay;
